titles.title: Hypersonic Research Airplane Authorization Act of 1993
To authorize appropriations for the design and construction of a hypersonic research airplane as part of the National Aerospace Plane Program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1627)
Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

committee.name: House Committee on Science, Space and Technology

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology, Environment and Aviation.

bill.summary: 6/24/1993--Introduced. Hypersonic Research Airplane Authorization Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of Defense and the Administrator of the National Aeronautics and Space Administration to submit jointly to the Congress a plan for the National Aerospace Plane Program, including development plans (and capped costs) for a hypersonic research airplane. Authorizes specified appropriations.
